item.title: B9 Networks WS 2021/22 - Resources
item.description: Material on this Site Title Tag Tools Working with HTW Machines ops, htw bash, hrz Debian Server web, ops Nginx web nginx VI vi vi Textbook If you can afford it, consider aquiring your own copy of the text book: Kurose, James F; Ross, Keith W.: Computer Networking. A Top-Down Approach, 8th ed., Pearson Global Editions, Harlow UK, 2021. ISBN: 978-1-292-40546-9 AvailablePearson, Lehmanns, Amazon. Access to the ebook is be available through the Library from within the HTW network (use the VPN from outside).
